Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy!!!
Reviews.Author: J. Prewitt
Reviews.Content: I bought this system on March 24, 2010; did not receive it until April 9 due to a "problem" with the receiver and replacement systems were shipped from Homg Kong. Initially, the system was fine, very easy to install the software, although the color was a bit washed out even at close range. Camera 2 failed after 2 weeks having an audio noise issue (loud buzzing & pops) no matter where it was placed. Emailed the seller on 05/10/2010 about the lack of warranty information and phone number for customer service. No response (Chowaka LLC). On 05/20, camera 4 stopped transmitting video either wireless or cable and was very hot to the touch. I assume the circuit board had a power issue or compenant failure; the audio is still functioning.Do not buy this system; no warranty, no phone numbers, no customer service from Chowaka. We have filed a claim with Amazon and will purchase a different system.

Reviews.Title: Look Somewhere Else!
Reviews.Author: Usmarine0622
Reviews.Content: Had problems installing the drivers on 4 different computers, there's next to no tech support. The "Built in DVR" requires a computer to be on 24/7 to record. For the same amount of money you can buy a Q-See DVR with a 320GB hard drive built in.

Reviews.Title: JUNK
Reviews.Author: M. Lisi "Michael"
Reviews.Content: The only thing worse than this product is the seller selling it. Its a complete waste of money and they will not honer any returns. Flush your money, you will get more satisfaction.

Reviews.Title: Suprise, suprise
Reviews.Author: MyOpinion
Reviews.Content: Do not be fooled by the picture of the unit. There are wires galore and electrical plugs required for every camera. So much for hidden security.The directions are vague and sparse. I have pretty good computer skills but I can't get anything to work. After hooking it up as directed, the software doesn't load and freezes my computer. The unit is not recognized by my computer. I think I may need a USB video capture card but I'm not sure and after days of searching the Web for answers I am more confused than ever at which one would work if that is the problem.I would not buy this product.

Reviews.Title: DONT BE AN IDIOT!!! READ ME FIRST!!!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey
Reviews.Content: This is the most terrible product i have ever purchased online, EVER. The pictures in the description are phony, COMPLETELY, the "IR" camera night vision is hilarious, its just some low level led's that put out just enough light to get a slight out line on the fuzzy and completely distorted screen. You have to option of wiring the camera right to the hub and even if they are wired, it is completely distorted and you arent able to see anything anyway. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT, IT WILL BE THE WORST DECISION YOU MAKE IN YOUR CAREER OF ONLINE PURCHASING, I SHOULD HAVE LISTENED TO THE REVIEWS, AND YOU SHOULD TOO...  LAME LAME LAME!!!

Reviews.Title: Frustrated
Reviews.Author: van
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera 3 weeks ago and it worked ok. Very easy to install but when I connect the receiver to the computer and install the software then it just works 45 minutes. The computer is frozen. I reinstalled the software but it still the same.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded My Expectations !!!, SUPER DEAL!!! I just love this product!!!
Reviews.Author: M. lowy "Mike"
Reviews.Content: We recently bought this system for the surveillance of my home. Everything came as expected and well packed the instructions in the user guide are quite good for what you need to do, Iinstalling it was simple and made sense. The audio feature I didn use yet so I can't comment on this but everything else sound pretty good especially the night vision feature, the cameras are unbelievably bright in a dimly lit area. I am very happy with the system and I have already recommended this system to a friend who is planning on buying it as well.I would highly recommend this to anyone!!!I just love this product!!!The low price is so unbelievable!!!

Reviews.Title: Day 4 with continued problem. Not Happy with product!!!
Reviews.Author: Shanna Bermodes "~Shanna~"
Reviews.Content: This system is still NOT working. I contacted seller whom is "working with me" to correct this issue and has "promised" to make things right at no additional cost- still waiting and now at day 4. I was reserving judgment, but at this point I'm very frustrated and would like a refund. One of my cameras is not working at all, so the pictures of the remaining working cameras are impacted;blinking,unclear and sometimes not visable at all.

Reviews.Title: communications
Reviews.Author: John M. Baynes "jbay"
Reviews.Content: I hade to contact the distributor many times, five, before they would get back to me on a voltage question, then when they finally answered me, they answered me wrong. This is not Amazon.com's fault, but the distributor's fault. must be a small company,

Reviews.Title: Security Cameras for Peace of Mind
Reviews.Author: Charles E. Heppehamer
Reviews.Content: I purchased these cameras after my dogs that stay in my back yard were poisoned with anti-freeze.Pros:Decent picture qualityNight visionEasy set upCons:IR LEDs glow dim red at nightCameras are very sensitive to interference causing a bad pictureAll cameras must be used. If only one is used the picture quality goes to unusable levels.When camera bases are mounted 90 degrees to cameras, you can not move the cameras side to side, only up and down.Overall I am very happy with the system. So far nothing of any importance has been captured but I feel better that there is always an eye watching my house.

Reviews.Title: super super good
Reviews.Author: Wolf Landau "wlfee"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this unit a few weeks ago, and I Soooooooo Goooooooooooooooooooooodd! it's so easy to use all-in-one package, and easy to set-up, and all the functions are so user fraindly.The main difference between these units and the others out there is that you can record all four cameras at the same time... I guess the other DVR systems can only record one camera at a time.. I was pleasantly surprised with this units' real time capabilities and quality of video and audio. Good product for everyone, thanks!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Equipment
Reviews.Author: Chaim Friedman
Reviews.Content: I bought this equipment for the surveillance of my home. I am evry pleased with this. Everything is in the box, The video quality is very good and the night vision is excellent. It is very easy to install and connect to internet, every step is detailed in the user manual. it took me like 2 hours the complete installation (I am not a person who ussualy do works like this).

Reviews.Title: Don't buy
Reviews.Author: Pat M
Reviews.Content: Very unhappy. Will not download into any computer. Have tried to download into three systems with no luck. Tried to contact electroshopUSA and have recieved no reply.Am fileing claim with amazon to try to resolve this issue.

Reviews.Title: Beware - no drivers for Windows 7
Reviews.Author: jodraka
Reviews.Content: Beware if you are thinking of this product. The driver support does not include Windows 7 or 64 bit platforms. There is absolutely no technical support or driver downloads. Bottom line - this product is usless unless you are running an old 32 bit platform.

Reviews.Title: wireless security camera
Reviews.Author: phil
Reviews.Content: These cameras work just fine, but there is one major problem the dvr software given to me was blank. I bought it so can record around my house and i cant even link it to my computer. I have e-mailed the company and have still got no response.I will write an awsome review if they give the right software for it,, but until that happens i have no use for it.

Reviews.Title: So So
Reviews.Author: BigAL
Reviews.Content: Works good for a cheep price. YOU MUST USE AN OLD OPERATION SYSTEM FOR YOUR COMPUTER. ummmm. anyhow. Its really not bad for the price.

Reviews.Title: This product is garbage
Reviews.Author: man
Reviews.Content: I purchased this system and is garbage, so I put I right there: in the garbage. I installed the camera and It do not work properly.

Reviews.Title: Could be MUCH better
Reviews.Author: Sulobaid Suevin
Reviews.Content: I got this same camera type for in my home due to having in home nursing care for my daughter. It over all lasted about a year with a little T.L.C. but ultamitly was not only crap but the C.D. that had the remote veiwing software was infected with a serious trojan virus som how and never did work online ever. I hounestly regret buying these cameras, there a waste of money. If you value home safty and are not a novice stay away from this model, no offence seller but YOU also should know better.

Reviews.Title: Not as Advertized.
Reviews.Author: George Shaffer
Reviews.Content: This item is sold as being Wireless with built in DVR...  1. it is NOT wireless. You might call it semi-wireless. the AV signal is wireless BUT each camera requires WIRING for power.  THERE IS NO DVR.  Only a receiver that has to then be connected to an external DVR if you want to record.  The USB Computer woud NOT WORK with two different new computers that I connected it to.  I returned the product and got a refund....

Reviews.Title: Not that good.
Reviews.Author: Jay Qureshi "Eclectic Gearhead"
Reviews.Content: After purchasing a special drive to share the video data, as this requested, it worked two days, then started issuing "no video card" for no good reason.  Install driver fail. how can this be when it's been working faithfully for at least 48 hours.After having installed in on my brand-used XP computer the same phenomenon occurred.Want to complain, but there is no where to turn.  Downloaded fixes only garbaged up my system without going to the source of the problem.Increasingly frustrated, as still I cannot leave the premises without some measure of security.please help. this thing is taking up millions of desk/power outlet connections resources, and for ought?This is horrible. please help if you know how to- Jay

Reviews.Title: Big Mistake
Reviews.Author: Papabare "More power"
Reviews.Content: The software doesn't install. I was directed to a site for more software but, of the 4 options they gave me none work. I installed on 2 PCs with the same results. If you can afford to flush money go for it.

Reviews.Title: caneras does not work with windows 7
Reviews.Author: mrtwin
Reviews.Content: I owned these cameras for about a year.  When I switched over to windows 7 they just don't work. Just a waste of money and you can not contact seller or company, there is no information neither company that made them. No phone number or address web and no physical address. Displeased owner of these cameras.  Now I use them as paper weights.

Reviews.Title: Cheap at a high price.
Reviews.Author: D. Young
Reviews.Content: The idea of the camera system is awesome. The night vision is very poor and difficult to make things out. The picture quality is poor. It goes out every few seconds. It is more static than the actually footage. It would be awesome if it wouldn't go out. They are within range. Really not worth $230. Maybe $1.50 or $1.75.

ProductInfo.Features:
QUAD Display allows viewing of all 4 cameras simultaneously; Record all four cameras in real time without a delay
2000/XP/Vista compatible without additional hardware or software
Remote Access/ Viewing-Watch your system anywhere in the world over a browser
30 LED's for SUPER Night Vision, colorful, vivid and bright pictures- Cameras are waterproof and can be used INDOOR or OUTDOOR
Can be used with TV or VCR, all RCA cables and power included; 150M Wireless Distance (open area)= 500 feet wireless distance
Note:It will knock out any Wifi signal around 30 meters
ProductInfo.Name: LYD Wireless Security System DVR Infrared Surveillance
